Uses of Package
org.codehaus.preon.annotation

Packages that use org.codehaus.preon.annotation
org.codehaus.preon.codec The package providing some default CodecFactories, supporting a number of different Codecs. 
org.codehaus.preon.sample.bmp   
org.codehaus.preon.sample.bytecode   
org.codehaus.preon.sample.rtp   
 

Classes in org.codehaus.preon.annotation used by org.codehaus.preon.codec
Choices
          The annotation allowing you to define a number of choices, based a prefix of a certain size.
 

Classes in org.codehaus.preon.annotation used by org.codehaus.preon.sample.bmp
Purpose
          A (probably) temporary solution for adding documentation to the fields to be used while generating documentation on the file format.
 

Classes in org.codehaus.preon.annotation used by org.codehaus.preon.sample.bytecode
Init
          An annotation for marking an operation to be invoked when an object has been decoded entirely.
TypePrefix
          The annotation used to indicate the discriminator used to recognize an instance of this class.
 

Classes in org.codehaus.preon.annotation used by org.codehaus.preon.sample.rtp
Bound
          A general purpose 'marker' annotation, indicating that a certain field is considered is expected to be retrieved from a BitBuffer when invoking Codec.decode(org.codehaus.preon.buffer.BitBuffer, Resolver, Builder).
BoundList
          The annotation used to mark List fields as potential candidates to be bound to a BitBuffer.
BoundNumber
          The annotation to add metadata on the way an integer field is represented in the BitBuffer.
